Package io.github.teamdonut.proj.controllers

Controller classes that handles the program's logical operations
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AboutUsController
    Class that handles the About Us page UI
    AppController
    Central Hub where all classes interact with
    BoardPageController
    This class handles the game board page UI
    GameController
    Game logic controller
    GameController.DrawInfo
    Container for data to be sent out to IObservers subscribed to this class
    MainController
    Main Screen Controller class
    SinglePlayerController
    Intermediate Screen controller class where the player can enter their name
    StartController
    Start page controller class
